channel.title: The Daily Pratchett
channel.description: A quote from Sir Terry Pratchett every day.

item.title: 05-Jun-16
item.description:
"There are *no* inconsistencies in the Discworld books; ocassionally, however, there are alternate pasts."

- Terry Pratchett, alt.fan.pratchett

item.title: 04-Jun-16
item.description:
"I do note with interest that old women in my books become young women on the covers... this is discrimination against the chronologically gifted."

- Terry Pratchett, alt.fan.pratchett

item.title: 03-Jun-16
item.description:
"I mean are we talking Thicko City here or what?"

Gaspode the wonder dog - Terry Pratchett, Moving Pictures

item.title: 02-Jun-16
item.description:
"Guilt was the grease in which the wheels of the authority turned."

- Terry Pratchett, Small Gods

item.title: 01-Jun-16
item.description:
"The significant owl hoots in the night."

- Terry Pratchett, Guards! Guards!
